attributes.action: reject the home secretary's proposition of allowing non-firearms officers to carry taser guns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC issued the following article -

More frontline police officers could soon be carrying 50,000-volt Taser stun guns under government plans. 

The Home Secretary John Reid made the announcement at the Police Federation of England and Wales' conference.

Currently officers can only use the guns if they are opposed with a weapon. The change will also allow them to be used when confronted with any form of violence or threat.

Amnesty International are opposed to the move, stating the guns have caused more than 70 deaths in america where they are most commonly used.
